posts.post_content: [Mind Rot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Rot) cries itself to sleep at night knowing it can never measure up to this card. Fearsomely powerful disruption.

posts.post_content: No kidding! Fallen Empires is almost entirely horrible creatures and equally horrible enchantments. The very few sorceries/instants include this monster, [Goblin Grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Grenade), and [Dwarven Catapult](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dwarven Catapult) which are the only two removal spells of any kind!

posts.post_content:
Hey, Fallen Empires has it's fair share of playable cards.  
  
[Fungal Bloom](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fungal Bloom)  
[Goblin Chirurgeon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Chirurgeon)  
[Goblin Grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Grenade)  
[Goblin War Drums](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin War Drums)  
[High Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Tide)  
[Hymn to Tourach](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hymn to Tourach)  
[Icatian Javelineers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Icatian Javelineers)  
[Icatian Infantry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Icatian Infantry)  
[Night Soil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Night Soil)  
[Order of Leitbur](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Order of Leitbur)  
[Order of the Ebon Hand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Order of the Ebon Hand)  
  
Of course, there are very few STELLAR cards in there.

Posted By: Richard_Hawk (12/27/2010 8:56:27 PM)
Rating:

by far my favorite card. 5 stars. this is up there with mind twist.

@bonerot, i agree. i really liked fallen empires. i try to work order of the ebon hand and order of leitbur into my decks now and then because the artwork kicks so much butt and they're underrated. first strike, pumping, and protection from blah. so awesome.

hymn to tourach is insane though. look at the top 8 vintage decklists from any time between 1995 and now... this will be in one of those decks. and it's from fallen empires. so weird.
